publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1271.3 Mary Scanlon: Primary Dental Health Careâ€”As an amendment to motion (S1M-1271) in the name of Susan Deacon, leave out from "affirms" to end and insert "notes the considerable improvements made in dental health in Scotland in the last 20 years; is committed to an effective and accessible NHS dental service for all who wish to use it in rural and urban Scotland, and supports the recently published Scottish Executive action plan for dental services in Scotland where it aims to build on past improvements in the dental and oral health of the people of Scotland and address inequalities in dental health.
